features.title: Features designed to help you win your dream job

createPersonalizedCVs.title: Create Personalized CVs
createPersonalizedCVs.description: Effortlessly import data and customize your CV based on your career goals

userFriendlyInterface.title: User-Friendly Interface
userFriendlyInterface.description: Step-by-step guidance to build your CV with ease

standOut.title: Stand Out
standOut.description: Generate a polished, professional CV tailored to your target opportunities

getHired.title: Get Hired
getHired.description: Increase your chances of landing your dream job with a standout CV

customizeCV.title: Customize Your CV to Match Your Career Goals
customizeCV.subtitle: Tailor your CV to specific job descriptions, companies, job titles, or university experiences to showcase your qualifications.

jobDescription.title: Job Description-Based
jobDescription.description: Highlight skills and experiences that make you the perfect candidate for the job.

companyDepartment.title: Company and Department-Specific
companyDepartment.description: Customize your CV for a particular company and department to demonstrate targeted interest.

cvCarousel.title: Create Your Perfect CV with ToBe.expert
cvCarousel.subtitle: Craft a tailored curriculum vitae that showcases your unique skills and experiences.

createCvSection.title: Create Your CV Today!
createCvSection.subtitle: Build a professional CV that stands out in the job market.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about the CV building process and features of SmartCV Builder.

question1.title: How does SmartCV Builder work?
question1.answer: Find answers to common questions about the CV building process and features of SmartCV Builder.

question2.title: Is my data secure?
question2.answer: Yes, your data is securely stored and protected.

question3.title: Can I customize my CV?
question3.answer: Yes, you can customize various aspects of your CV.

question4.title: How can I sign up?
question4.answer: You can sign up on our website.

question5.title: Is there a cost?
question5.answer: Our service is free with premium options available.

contactUs.title: Still have questions?
contactUs.subtitle: Contact our support team for further assistance.

ending.newsletter: Stay up to date on the latest features and releases by joining our newsletter.
